system.damageOrEffect: Reduce Damage by 2. Target and everyone within 2m of them must make +0 Agility Test or catch on fire. Can choose to target object or specific area instead of specific target. The Shot is +20, and everyone within 2m must test to avoid fire as usual.

description.value:
Damage/Effect: Reduce Damage by 2. Target and everyone within 2m of them must make +0 Agility Test or catch on fire. Can choose to target object or specific area instead of specific target. The Shot is +20, and everyone within 2m must test to avoid fire as usual.

Qualities: Flame
